title: Police searching for suspect after shooting in N.E. Oklahoma City
content:
OKLAHOMA CITY – Police are searching for the suspect responsible for a shooting in northeast Oklahoma City.
Around 9:30 p.m. Wednesday, police were called to reports of a shooting near N.E. 23rd and Martin Luther King.
When police arrived on scene they found a person in the street with wounds consistent with a gunshot.
The victim was transported to a local hospital in critical condition.
So far police have not made any arrests but say the suspect was last seen wearing a brown hoodie.
This is a developing story, check back for updates.
